visit_factory_title: Take a sneak peek at our factory!
visit_factory_text: We keep our factory process very transparent, and we are not afraid to prove the '100% Natural' title
about_us: Our company has more than 20 years of history, where our first Swiftlet (Bird Nest) house was bought in 1995. We hand harvest our bird nests on a regular basis from our Switflet houses all over Malaysia, which ensure they are pure, clean, and high-quality. Our factory processes birdnesses in a hygienic and chemical-free environment without adding any food colorings or bleach into our birdnesses, which again ensures they not only taste great, but also 100% natural.
disclaimer_warn: This website currently only accepts orders from Malaysia and Malaysia only, customers from other regions such as China, please contact us via Wechat, Facebook, Instagram, email, or phone!
connected: Get connected with us on social networks!
